attributes.action: Ban and outlaw the ISLAM4UK group
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: outlaw the fanatical ISLAM4Uk group, these people are fanantical and have insulted every member of our country and Her Majestys Forces, there planned protest and march not only outrages the british public but further afield,They plan to disrespect our forces with there intended protest at Wooten Basset.

rejection.details: Islam4UK, along with a number of other extremist groups, has been proscribed by the Home Secretary. I will be illegal to become a member of this group as of Thursday 14 January.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
